text: Hey team, real quick one. Is there a way to handle importing rich-text columns from .csv? Looks like my team will want to be importing content with bullet points, the rest of the content table is excel/csv.

Usually the rich text data is formatted.. If the csv file has data with that formatting, it should import properly.. To understand, you can export some data from table with riich text column and check the csv file

Hi, I am trying to give Create Table access to a developer on HubDB. But unable to do it.

I am granted him Read, Write and Publish permissions on HubDB table. However he is not yet able to create or modify table structure.

Anyone can help please ?
Thanks Gobi, suppose the challenge is formatting this for the entire column without any manual tedium! :thinking_face:
can u dm the portal and user details i can take a look
Creating and updating table structures require hubdb_admin access
